price: Na akawakagua ndege, na akasema: Imekuwaje, mbona simwoni Hud-hud, au amekuwa miongoni mwa walio ghibu?
arabic: وَتَفَقَّدَ ٱلطَّيۡرَ فَقَالَ مَالِيَ لَآ أَرَى ٱلۡهُدۡهُدَ أَمۡ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَآئِبِينَ
footnotes: Akalikagua jeshi lake la ndege asimwone Hud-hud. Akastaajabu, akasema: Mbona simwoni Hud-hud! Yupo hapa na mimi simwoni, au ameghibu hayupo miongoni mwetu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: watafaqqada al-ṭayra faqāla mā liya lā arā al-hud'huda am kāna mina al-ghāibīna
